sense.gloss: to hang, to suspend, to sling, to wear (e.g. a sword), to put up (e.g. a shelf)
to hoist an opponent off of his feet by his loincloth
to turn upwards (as if being pulled), to be slanted (of eyes)
to pucker (e.g. of a seam), to be pulled tight
mechanism used to lift an actor onto the stage (in kabuki)
hanging oneself, person who hanged themselves
ready-made clothing, off-the-rack clothing, second-hand clothes, hand-me-down
to denounce, to subject someone to a kangaroo court
to hold (the opponent) in the arms and carry him out of the ring
to lift (with a crane, ropes, etc.), to raise, to hoist
to manipulate (a price) upward, to (artificially) raise, to push up, to inflate, to jack up
temple bell, hanging bell, funeral bell
to be lifted up (with a crane, ropes, etc.), to be raised, to be hoisted
to turn upward (esp. of eyes), to slant upward
hanging in midair, suspended in midair
to suspend from, to be suspended (from)
hanger (e.g. for mosquito net), hanging strap
winning technique where the opponent is lifted out by his belt
slant eyes, almond-shaped eyes, eyes that are turned up at the corners
suspension point (for suspension rope bondage), hardpoint

sdata.j: ランプが↑木↑↓き↓の↑枝↑↓えだ↓から↑吊↑↓つ↓り↑下↑↓さ↓げられた。
sdata.e: The lamp was suspended from the branch of a tree.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓たちの↑目↑↓め↓の↑前↑↓まえ↓に↑吊↑↓つ↓り↑橋↑↓ばし↓がある。
sdata.e: There is a suspension bridge ahead of us.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓たちの↑前↑↓まえ↓に↑吊↑↓つ↓り↑橋↑↓ばし↓がある。
sdata.e: There is a suspension bridge ahead of us.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑吊↑↓つる↓し↑上↑↓あ↓げを↑食↑↓く↓った。
sdata.e: I was tried in a kangaroo court.

sdata.j: ↑泥棒↑↓どろぼう↓にロープを↑十分↑↓じゅうぶん↓に↑与↑↓あた↓えれば、↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑首吊↑↓くびつ↓りをするであろう。
sdata.e: Give a thief enough rope and he'll hang himself.

sdata.j: ↑吊革↑↓つりかわ↓におつかまり↑下↑↓くだ↓さい。
↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑首吊↑↓くびつ↓り↑自殺↑↓じさつ↓をした。
sdata.e: He committed suicide by hanging himself.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑天井↑↓てんじょう↓にランプを↑吊↑↓つる↓した。
sdata.e: He hung a lamp from the ceiling.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑悲嘆↑↓ひたん↓にくれて、↑首吊↑↓くびつ↓り↑自殺↑↓じさつ↓をした。
sdata.e: He was heartbroken and hanged himself.

sdata.j: ↑部屋↑↓へや↓の↑天井↑↓てんじょう↓には↑電灯↑↓でんとう↓が↑吊↑↓つ↓られていない。
sdata.e: There are no lights hanging from the roof in the room.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓はシャツを↑吊↑↓つ↓るしている。
てるてる↑坊主↑↓ぼうず↓、↑逆↑↓さか↓さまに↑吊↑↓つ↓るしてたら、あした↑雨↑↓あめ↓になるかな？
sdata.e: If you hang a teru teru bozu upside down, do you think it will bring rain tomorrow?
